> Is there more specific documentation that helps out a more novice
> developer like myself?

There's the developer's guide:
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual/building.html#eclipse

> Any help would be greatly appreciated,

You'll need to copy the /lib directory jar files to a /lib directory in 
your Eclipse project.  Otherwise it sounds like you should be ready to 
go.  To run Heritrix in Eclipse, right-click the 
org.archive.crawler.Heritrix class and select "Debug As/Java Application."


-Paul
